content: गाढ {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} [गाह्-क्त] {@--1@} Dived or plunged into, bathed in, deeply entered. {@--2@} Frequently plunged into, resorted to, thickly crowded or inhabited; तपस्विगाढां तमसां प्राप नदीं तुरंगमेण <ls>R. 9. 72.</ls> {@--3@} Closely pressed together, tightly drawn, fast, close, tight; गाढांगदैर्बाहुभिः <ls>R. 16. 60</ls>; गाढालिंगन <ls>Amaru. 36</ls>, a close embrace; <ls>Ch. P. 6.</ls> {@--4@} Thick, dense. {@--5@} Deep, impervious. {@--6@} Strong, vehement excessive, intense; गाढनिद्रामवाप fell fast asleep; 20 °उद्वेग excessively tor-mented; <ls>U. 3. 31</ls>; <ls>Māl. 9. 12</ls>; गाढोत्कंठाललितलुलितैरंगकैस्ताम्यतीति <ls>Māl. 1. 15</ls>; <ls>Me. 83</ls>; प्राप्तगाढप्रकंपा <ls>Ś. Til. 12</ls>; <ls>Amaru. 72</ls>; so also गाढतप्तेन तप्तं <ls>Me. 102.</ls> --ढं {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} Closely, fast, much, excessively, heavily, vehemently, powerfully.
